about_the_game:
Finally, the Final Part 1 is released!

Noel the Mortal Fate is the tale of Noel, a girl who has lost her limbs, and Caron, the devil who took them, as they embark together on an action-packed journey for revenge. Take control of Noel, Caron and their allies to explore the game's locales, fight off their enemies, and complete other missions to progress through the story.

The newly released Steam version of "Noel the Mortal Fate: Final Part 1" is also available in three languages: Japanese, English, and Simplified Chinese.
In the Final Part 1, the campaign for the final battle finally begins.
In this work, there is also a new element where the scenario diverges depending on the player's actions and choices......!?

As the city of Laplace is suddenly rocked by a "runoff election," Noel and her friends split into two groups and launch a counterattack to stop Burrows' ambitions.
To settle their many past scores, players must complete infiltration and battle missions to reach the climax of the game!

Final Season Part 1

There are only a few days left until the "runoff election" to fulfill Burrows' ambitions.
The night before his final speech, the "Witch of the Oppressed" finally declares war.

Noel, Caron, and Oscar try to infiltrate the mayor's mansion to make contact with Burrows.
While Fugo and his friends cause disturbances in various places, Ribelio and his friends escape from prison to join the fight...
The operation seems to be going smoothly, but what awaits him there are people with a vortex of fate....

Former comrades, enemies, and friends.
Noel and her team set out to overcome their respective pasts.
The final battle is about to begin!
